description: High-grade endometrioid adenocarcinoma (FIGO grade III) confined to the uterus with less than 50% myometrial invasion, lymphovascular invasion present, and no lymph node metastases, corresponding to FIGO stage IA (pT1a pN0).
patient_notes: Your surgery removed a cancer called endometrioid adenocarcinoma that was confined to the lining of the uterus with no spread to lymph nodes. The tumor was high grade but fully resected with clear margins. We will discuss additional treatments such as radiation therapy to reduce the chance of recurrence.

verification.assessment: All staging fields are accurate; only the treatment recommendation field lacks the NCCN guideline-specified adjuvant therapy for high-intermediate-risk uterine endometrioid adenocarcinoma.

recommended_treatment.issues: Treatment field left as 'Not specified' but NCCN guidelines recommend specific adjuvant therapy for Stage IA Grade III with LVSI.

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Adjuvant vaginal brachytherapy'. Reason: Treatment field left as 'Not specified' but NCCN guidelines recommend specific adjuvant therapy for Stage IA Grade III with LVSI.
